modName: Whiterun Kjeller - A Whiterun and Breezehome expansion - non-Hearthfire version
summary:
Check out what the Whiterun underground looks like and get

Two mods for the Price of One 

This mod adds a large beautiful underground to Whiterun, including more cool merchants

AND a Breezehome expansion with the missing pieces from Breezehome  - making your first home in Skyrim fully equipped.
descriptionHtml:
[color=red]
This mod is not compatible with the Hearthfire add-on. If you've got Hearthfire use this version instead: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/42494]Whiterun Kjeller (Hearthfire version)[/url] 
[/color]
[heading][color=orange]
Check out what the Whiterun underground looks like!
[/color][/heading]
This mod adds a beautiful underground and more cool merchants to Whiterun, [i]and includes[/i] 
a Breezehome expansion making your first home in Skyrim fully equipped, without extra load doors.

[b]WHITERUN KJELLER[/b] is a large underground area where you will find more Whiterun merchants, 
each with his/her own specialty and a large supply of goods. 
You can stock up on supplies here before your next quest, and even live here if you like. 

[b]BREEZEHOME KJELLER[/b] is a Breezehome expansion with the missing pieces from Breezehome: 
arcane enchanter, mannequins, display cases etc. It's also a fully equipped player home which can
be used independently of Breezehome. 

[heading][color=orange]
Recommended complementary mods 
[/color][/heading]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29786]New Heimdall[/url] 

more Whiterun underground - including a prison (irritate the inmates at your own peril) 
and a player home with a healing swimming pool. 

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1111]Pure Waters[/url]  

makes the fish pond look better 

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11370]Spouses Can Live Everywhere[/url]

[heading][color=orange]
Instructions 
[/color][/heading]
This mod is not compatible with the Hearthfire add-on. If you've got Hearthfire use this version instead: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/42494]Whiterun Kjeller (Hearthfire version)[/url] 

If this mod is conflicting with another of your Breezehome mods, use the Hearthfire version instead.

[heading][color=orange]
FAQ 
[/color][/heading]
How do I find the Kjeller? 
[i]
Entrances: Breezehome; outside Hall of the Dead and House Gray-Mane and near the Whiterun main gate. 
[/i]
Why are there two versions of this mod?
[i]
Because it's very hard to mod Breezehome and keep it compatible with Hearthfire.

The two versions only differ when it comes to the original Breezehome house area, the most essential areas of this mod are the same.

If you are a non-Hearthfire user I recommend the non-Hearthfire version, you can, however,
choose wich version you like the best, it's just a matter of taste.
[/i]

Contact 

etrennert@yahoo.com
author: newheimdall
